name: Keishi Tajima
content: Keishi TAJIMA - Kyoto University [ English | Japanese ] Keishi TAJIMA, D.Sc. (1996, the Dept. of Information Science of University of Tokyo) Professor at Institute for Liberal Arts and Sciences, Kyoto University Professor at Social Media Research Unit, Social Informatics Course, Graduate School of Informatics, Kyoto University (secondary) 2005.05-2013.03: an associate professor at Dept. of Social Informatics, Graduate School of Informatics, Kyoto University. 2001.09-2006.03: an associate professor (-2005.04) / a visiting associate professor (2005.05-) at School of Information Science, JAIST. 2000.08-2001.08: a visiting assistant professor at the Dept. of Computer and Information Science, University of Pennsylvania and a member of the database research group. 1996.04-2001.08: a research associate at the Dept. of Computer and Systems Eng., Kobe University and a member of the database research group led by Katsumi Tanaka. 1994.04-1996.03: a resident at Research Institute of Mathematical Sciences of Kyoto University. Advisor: Atsushi Ohori. Also a member of KABA. 1987.04-1996.03: a student at the Dept. of Information Science of University of Tokyo. Advisor (1990-1994): Takashi Masuda, Kazuhiko Kato. Program Committee: WWW'26 (full, short), WSDM'26 (full,short), CIKM'25 (full, short), SIGIR'25 (full, short), IUI'25 (demo/poster), WSDM'25, CIKM'24 (full, short), ICMR'24, SIGIR'24 (full, short), AAAI'24, WSDM'24, SIGIR-AP'23, HCOMP'23, CIKM'23 (full, short), SIGIR'23 (full, short), WSDM'23, HCOMP'22, CIKM'22, SIGIR'22 (full, short), WSDM'22, CIKM'21, KDD'21, SIGIR'21, IUI'21 (demo/poster), WSDM'21, CIKM'20, VLDB'20 (demo), SIGIR'20, … Research Interests Social Information Extraction and Analysis Social Network Analysis Crowdsourcing (CREST CyborgCrowd Project) Information Retrieval Information Access User Interface Data Models Data Security Publications (copyright notice) a longer but yet incomplete list a list at DBLP ACM Digital Library Author Page Recent Publications title /
